name: Pokemon Gold and Silver Spaceworld Demo
name_original: Pokemon Gold and Silver Spaceworld Demo
description:
This is the Pokemon Silver and Gold early prototype/beta from 1997-1999.

There are a lot more optional files in the zip archive.

Unfortunately these games are only in Japanese.

However there are completed hacks of the spaceworld versions and are in english.

Links:

https://www.gbahacks.com/2020/02/gold-97.html

https://www.gbahacks.com/2020/10/pokemon-super-gold-97.html

https://www.gbahacks.com/2020/11/pokemon-gold-and-silver-97-reforged.html

NOTE:

I am NOT the original owner of this game, I have published this game on this site for public enjoyment and entertainment.
